# 使用%>%簡化程式寫法

```{R}
library(magrittr)
load(url("https://storage.googleapis.com/r_rookies/straw_hat_df.RData"))

straw_hat_df$birth_date1 <- Sys.Date() %>%
  format( format = '%Y') %>%
  as.numeric() %>%
  `-` (straw_hat_df$age) %>%
  paste(straw_hat_df$birthday, sep = "-") %>%
  as.Date()
```
